
# Data Sources

The list of data sources used in this project. For more details on how is each dataset
used and processed, refer to the [Methodology](method.qmd).

## List of data source

Below is a list of data sources organised by the purpose

### Project-wide

- OS | 2011 Census Output Areas | [link](https://geoportal.statistics.gov.uk/datasets/ons::output-areas-dec-2011-boundaries-ew-bgc/about)

### Accessibility indicators

- ONS | Population Weighted Centroids (PWC) of Output Areas | [link](https://www.ons.gov.uk/census/2001censusandearlier/dataandproducts/outputgeography/outputareas)
- ONS | Workplace zones | [link](https://www.nomisweb.co.uk/sources/census_2011_wp)
- OS | Open Greenspace  | [link](https://beta.ordnancesurvey.co.uk/products/os-open-greenspace)
- OSM | OpenStreetMap network data | [link](https://openstreetmap.org)
- ITS Leeds | UK GTFS data | [link](https://itsleeds.github.io/UK2GTFS/)

### Air quality

- DEFRA | UK AIR | [link](https://uk-air.defra.gov.uk/data/pcm-data)

### House price

- Chi et al. | A new attribute-linked
residential property price dataset for England and Wales 2011-2019 | [link](https://dx.doi.org/10.5255/UKDA-SN-854240)

### Explanatory variables for modelling

- ONS | Population estimates | [link](https://www.ons.gov.uk/file?uri=/peoplepopulationandcommunity/populationandmigration/populationestimates/datasets/censusoutputareaestimatesinthenortheastregionofengland/mid2020sape23dt10d/sape23dt10dmid2020coaunformattedsyoaestimatesnortheast.xlsx)
- ONS | Workplace population | [link](https://www.nomisweb.co.uk/sources/census_2011_wp)
- Copernicus | CORINE Land Cover classification | [link](https://land.copernicus.eu/pan-european/corine-land-cover)
- The Alan Turing Institute | Spatial Signatures of Great Britain | [link](https://urbangrammarai.xyz/story/)
